column5: This might be abit early but since we are in the month of December, I wanted to share this video with everyone. It's been awhile since I seen this and it was a great joy to see this years ago.  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=upGhjNXcBk8
Thanks, that's my alltime favorite, I still kill myself everytime I watch it.

Mr. Bean is my hero.   I had purchased the complete box set and watch it from time to time.  The guy has to a be genious to be that stupid and not even look like he is 'acting'.   I did see there were some cartoon versions ... saw some at one of the camps were were at a couple years ago.    They need to make a BEAN 2
hey thats not a bad idea of purchasingthe entire set. Do know why I didn't figure that one out long ago.  dsn

I seldom watch television, but if I know there's gonna be a Mr. Bean episode on, I'll be there front & center with my coke & popcorn and laffing thru the whole show.  He's right up there with Archie Bunker & Cosmo Kramer  Thanks nelly, that was hilarious !!!!!!
I had also found a VHS called "Rowan Aktinson Live".  He does a couple of his usual routines - then a some stand-ups that you would not want your kids listening to.  Laughing all the way.
